DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure  MGMT Methylation Assay Non-Protocol  Performed Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to a non-protocol determination of MGMT methylation status.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure  MGMT Methylation Assay Non-Protocol  Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a non-protocol determination of  MGMT methylation status.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: No Value Exists:Treatment not specified in a protocol.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: An assay to determine the pattern of methylation in the promoter of the MGMT gene. Aberrant methylation of the MGMT promoter is associated with squamous cell carcinoma.
Treatment not specified in a protocol.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
